job.title: Software Developer 4

job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongWe are looking for a seasoned cloud security developer to join our efforts in reshaping the cloud services landscape across industry verticals and contribute to the revolution of securing Cloud Services to the worlds most critical organizations The SaaS Cloud Security organization is responsible for securing enterprisegrade software services on behalf of our 25000 customers processing over 60 billion transactions per daybrbrAs a senior principal developer responsible for the SaaS Cloud Security Team you will be building the initial machine learning and AI based security analytics for the security incident response processes within the Oracle SaaS cloud and infrastructure Your analysis and automation will be used to perform investigations forensic analysis and risk trends based on security events that may occur in Oracles SaaS services The security data science engineering working will be a foundation and value proposition for attack detection from a global SOC and providing a world class incident detection and response operations servicebrbrThis organization will be responsible for detecting advanced persistent threat APT and other sophisticated cyberattacks supporting the SaaS Cloud Security Detection and Response team to derive indicators of compromise that can then be leveraged throughout the Oracle Cloud technical security research and supporting external customers with the Oracle SaaS Automated Cloud Security servicesbrbrThis position requires strong engineering experience familiarity with machine learning techniques and implementations and deep technical knowledge in cloud andor security and hands on strategic leadership in building a successful ethical hacking team organization motions and tactical execution methods With your deep security and cloud experience you will shape not only the future of cloud development and adoption at Oracle  but influence the global security landscape in key vertical industriesbrbrBehind every missioncritical Cloud service is a sophisticated SaaS architecture supporting the largest companies in the world employing the most advanced software engineering We are proud to support those services and team with customers who depend on them continually innovating and challenging the status quo Our team environment is progressive
